Sentencas: Crofer 22 APU is used as metallic interconnects in stacking solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) operated at elevated temperatures (above 700 degrees C) owing to their excellent oxidation resistance.
Titulo: Understanding early-stage oxidation mechanism of Crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell steel interconnect using glow discharge optical emission spectroscopy and grazing incidence X-ray diffraction

Sentencas: Understanding the protective layer formation in the initial oxidation stage would be useful for optimizing and designing protective coatings for extended life.
Titulo: Understanding early-stage oxidation mechanism of Crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell steel interconnect using glow discharge optical emission spectroscopy and grazing incidence X-ray diffraction

Sentencas: Initial stage oxidation of Crofer 22 APU steel using surface analytical tools such as glow discharge optical emission spectroscopy (GD-OES), grazing incidence X-ray diffraction (GIXRD), Raman spectroscopy, and atomic force microscopy (AFM) are studied in the paper.
Titulo: Understanding early-stage oxidation mechanism of Crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell steel interconnect using glow discharge optical emission spectroscopy and grazing incidence X-ray diffraction

Sentencas: An oxidation test on as-received Crofer 22 APU steel was carried out in a controlled atmosphere (0.01 Pa) in an in-situ high-temperature X-ray diffraction (XRD) stage at 950 degrees C. Normal XRD showed no indication of oxidation, while GIXRD revealed the formation of two-layer oxides: Top layer spinel MnCr2O4 and fine-grained inner layer Cr2O3, which was confirmed and quantified by GD-OES depth profiling.
Titulo: Understanding early-stage oxidation mechanism of Crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell steel interconnect using glow discharge optical emission spectroscopy and grazing incidence X-ray diffraction

Sentencas: The Cr2O3 formed initially led to the formation of MnCr2O4 spinel during the initial stage.
Titulo: Understanding early-stage oxidation mechanism of Crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell steel interconnect using glow discharge optical emission spectroscopy and grazing incidence X-ray diffraction

Sentencas: The rapid diffusion of Mn through the fine-grained Cr2O3 layer results in an increased growth rate of MnCr2O4 spinel on the top of the fine-grained Cr2O3 layer.
Titulo: Understanding early-stage oxidation mechanism of Crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell steel interconnect using glow discharge optical emission spectroscopy and grazing incidence X-ray diffraction
